name: FRigUnit_AimItem
doc:
Aligns the rotation of a primary and secondary axis of a bone to a global target.
Note: This node operates in global space!

Item: The name of the item to align
Primary: The primary target for the aim
Secondary: The secondary target for the aim - also referred to as PoleVector / UpVector
Weight: The weight of the change - how much the change should be applied
DebugSettings: The debug setting for the node
ExecuteContext: * This property is used to chain multiple mutable units together
